definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: "She looks like a tramp, " said Tonder.
These wanderers were once part of India's mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 这些流浪者曾经是印度的主流。

sentences.english: Make gingerbread cookies and bring them to a homeless shelter.
sentences.chinese: 做一点姜饼曲奇，带他们去流浪者接待所。

sentences.english: Poor little dog, the tromp said sadly.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的小狗，“流浪者难过地说。”

sentences.english: What of the ox who loves his yoke and deems the elk and deer of the forest stray and vagrant things?
sentences.chinese: 对喜欢挽轭，视林中康鹿为迷途流浪者的公牛呢？

sentences.english: A hobo, especially one who carries a bedroll.
sentences.chinese: 流浪者，游民流浪汉，尤指带着铺盖卷。

sentences.english: I am listless, I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我心绪不宁，我是自己心中的流浪者。

sentences.english: She and some tramps found the trail of rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 她和一些流浪者发现了野兔的踪迹。

sentences.english: A female student travels through Europe while filming vagrants. She tries to phone someone several times but no one answers.
sentences.chinese: 一个女学生周游欧洲拍摄流浪者题材的影片。

sentences.english: I met a wanderer in the street yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天在街上遇见了一个流浪者。

sentences.english: Now she is an activist for homeless people in Seattle, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是华盛顿西雅图市为流浪者积极奔走的人。

sentences.english: I feel I have come to know this hero, this wanderer.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我有必要认识下这个英雄，这个流浪者。

sentences.english: She is always a loiterer in England with writing as a comfort.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，她始终是一位流浪者，写作是她的慰藉。

sentences.english: Sometimes, life is a struggle, and I am a straggler.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候，生活是迷途，而我是一个流浪者。

definition: Romani, an ethnic group of Europe
